welcome_message_body: Welcome to Karaj, Iran! Get ready to experience the beauty of this charming city, known for its lush greenery, historic sites, and warm hospitality. Take your time to explore and enjoy all that Karaj has to offer.

restaurants.name: نان و شيريني ماني
